title: The Week of Wisdom: Pit Collins Saves Metroburg

story.text: Pit Collins begins his week as usual, tutoring young minds in the library. Unbeknownst to him, a sinister plot brews beneath the city.
While walking home, Pit stumbles upon a glowing stone that spirals with wisdom and power. He takes it home, curious about its properties.
With the stone's power, Pit senses a looming disaster underneath Metroburg. He decides it’s time to put his lifetime’s wisdom to use beyond tutoring.
Pit uses his new powers to advise the city’s mayor on evacuation procedures, explaining the danger from his visions and the stone's messages.
The city starts the evacuation. Pit, using his knowledge and new abilities, helps coordinate safe passages for everyone, preventing chaos.
The disaster strikes: a network of hidden underground labs explodes. Thanks to Pit’s foresight, there are no casualties.
Metroburg is in ruins, but the people are safe. Pit, known now as ‘The Sage of the City,’ vows to guide the rebuilding efforts.

ending: In the twilight of his years, Pit Collins not only imparted knowledge but also became a beacon of salvation.
moral: Wisdom is not only knowing what to do but having the courage to act on it.
